title: A Thread Without a Knot - Harrison and Endicott

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Fisher uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex relationship between Harrison and Professor Endicott.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Fisher uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex relationship between Harrison and Professor Endicott.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain the function of contrasting characters.
